column1: Appellant) was not made a party when the Law specifically provides for the culpability of the
owner if in fact, he was culpable in the commission of the offence.
Amendment of section 25 of the principal enactment.
Section 25 of the principal enactment as last amended by Act No. 13 of 1982 is hereby further
